verses.text_plain: Return, O Lord, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies’ sake.

verses.text_plain: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
verses.verse_html:
6I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears. ▼

tokens.definition: שׁוּב shûwb, shoob; a primitive root; to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again:—((break, build, circumcise, dig, do anything, do evil, feed, lay down, lie down, lodge, make, rejoice, send, take, weep)) × again, (cause to) answer ( again), × in any case (wise), × at all, averse, bring (again, back, home again), call (to mind), carry again (back), cease, × certainly, come again (back), × consider, continually, convert, deliver (again), deny, draw back, fetch home again, × fro, get (oneself) (back) again, × give (again), go again (back, home), (go) out, hinder, let, (see) more, × needs, be past, × pay, pervert, pull in again, put (again, up again), recall, recompense, recover, refresh, relieve, render (again), requite, rescue, restore, retrieve, (cause to, make to) return, reverse, reward, say nay, send back, set again, slide back, still, × surely, take back (off), (cause to, make to) turn (again, self again, away, back, back again, backward, from, off), withdraw.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: return (391x), ...again (248x), turn (123x), ...back (65x), ...away (56x), restore (39x), bring (34x), render (19x), answer (18x), recompense (8x), recover (6x), deliver (5x), put (5x), withdraw (5x), requite (4x), miscellaneous (40x).

tokens.definition: בּוּשׁ bûwsh, boosh; a primitive root; properly, to pale, i.e. by implication to be ashamed; also (by implication) to be disappointed or delayed:—(be, make, bring to, cause, put to, with, a-) shamed(-d), be (put to) confounded(-fusion), become dry, delay, be long.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: ashamed (72x), confounded (21x), shame (9x), all 2 (inf. for emphasis) , confusion (1x), delayed (1x), dry (1x), long (1x), shamed (1x).
outline: to put to shame, be ashamed, be disconcerted, be disappointed (Qal) to feel shame to be ashamed, disconcerted, disappointed (by reason of) (Piel) to delay (in shame) (Hiphil) to put to shame to act shamefully to be ashamed (Hithpolel) to be ashamed before one another
(Qal) to feel shame to be ashamed, disconcerted, disappointed (by reason of)
to be ashamed, disconcerted, disappointed (by reason of)
(Hiphil) to put to shame to act shamefully to be ashamed
(Hithpolel) to be ashamed before one another

tokens.definition: רֶגַע regaʻ, reh'-gah; from H7280 . a wink (of the eyes), i.e. a very short space of time:—instant, moment, space, suddenly.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: moment (18x), instant (2x), space (1x), suddenly (1x).
outline: for a moment, at one moment...at another moment with preposition
